response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is worth $1,500,000 to you, and I am extending this chance to own it at a special price. My offer to you is $1,200,000. This price not only reflects the significant investment I have made into this product but also allows you to secure a remarkable asset at a competitive rate compared to its market value. I trust that this proposal will meet your expectations and facilitate a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let me know if you require any additional information or have questions about the product. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
